Package Controller.Request

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Request.OrderController
public class OrderController extends Object
This class controls all operations relating to Order
Author:
Elbert Gunawan, Saffron Lim and Christian Asher Widjaja

    • createOrder

      public static void createOrder(String branch, ArrayList menuList)
      Allows the customer to place an order, which is then saved into OrderRepo.txt.
      Parameters:
      branch - String representing the customer's branch
      menuList - ArrayList of FoodItems

    • confirmOrder

      public static int confirmOrder()
      Allows the customer to choose the next option: (1) Confirm Order (2) Update Order (3) Delete Order
      Returns:
      an integer value of the customer's response.

      Returns:

      public static Entity.Order.Order getOrderById(int orderId)

      Returns:
      an Order object.

    • processPayment

      public static boolean processPayment()
      Allows the customer to make payment. Uses PasswordMasker.hideString() to hide the payment details.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if payment is successful and false otherwise.
